geodata-bad-type: {{doc-important|Do not translate coordinates.}} "type" is the argument name. This message means that the value of the argument "type" is unrecognized. Parameters: * $1 - coordinate type. valid types are: country, airport, landmark, etc.
geodata-bad-globe: {{doc-important|Do not translate coordinates.}} "globe" is the argument name. This message means that the value of the argument "globe" is unrecognized. Parameters: * $1 - value of the argument "globe" Terrestrial body on which the coordinate resides. By default, Earth is assumed. Other globes include earth, mercury, venus, moon, mars, ...
geodata-bad-region: {{doc-important|Do not translate #coordinates.}} Used as fatal error message. "region" is the argument name. This message means that the value of the argument "region" is unrecognized. Parameters: * $1 - (Unused) region code
geodata-multiple-primary: {{doc-important|Do not translate #coordinates.}} Used as error message.
geodata-limit-exceeded: Used as fatal error message. Parameters: * $1 - number of tags; value of the global variable $wgMaxCoordinatesPerPage
geodata-broken-tags-category-desc: Description on [[Special:TrackingCategories]] for the {{msg-mw|geodata-broken-tags-category}} tracking category.
geodata-unknown-type-category-desc: Description on [[Special:TrackingCategories]] for the {{msg-mw|geodata-unknown-type-category}} tracking category.
geodata-unknown-globe-category-desc: Description on [[Special:TrackingCategories]] for the {{msg-mw|geodata-unknown-globe-category}} tracking category.
geodata-unknown-region-category-desc: Description on [[Special:TrackingCategories]] for the {{msg-mw|geodata-unknown-region-category}} tracking category.
geodata-search-feature-invalid-coordinat: Warning shown to users when providing invalid coordinates to a geo search keyword.
geodata-search-feature-invalid-distance: Warning shown to users when providing invalid distance qualifier to a geo search keyword.
geodata-search-feature-unknown-title: Warning shown to users when providing an unknown title to a geo search keyword.
geodata-search-feature-title-no-coordina: Warning shown to users when providing an article title that has no coordinates to a geo search keyword.
geodata-search-timeout: Warning shown to users when a search takes too long
